thread.title: Instagram Adds Support for iOS 9, iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
thread.title_full: Instagram Adds Support for iOS 9, iPhone 6s and 6s Plus - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Instagram Adds Support for iOS 9, iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
text: Instagram Inc has just published Instagram 7.6.1, the newest version of their iOS client app in Apple's App Store. This is a compatibility release designed to add support for iOS 9. As the changelog issued with this release says, Instagram 7.6.1 is the version you want to have on your iOS device if you want to use all the new features available in the last iOS 9 release. Furthermore, the new version's release notes add that the Apple's just launched iPhone 6s and iPhone ... Â»
